reviewText:
Great series BUT this blu-ray version is in Japanese ONLY!  So even though it is a Region A disc and will play in US blu-ray players, there are NO English subtitles available. As usual, Amazon omits these important details in the product description.
There is a US version being released however.  It is scheduled for release on June 6, 2015 and will be titled:
Expelled from Paradise Limited Edition.  But it looks like you will have to get this version from another site since it is not offered here on Amazon. Check Rightstuf for this new US release.
